name: Silent Image
components: V, S, F (a bit of fleece)
effect: visual figment that cannot extend beyond four 10-ft. cubes + one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
text: This spell creates the visual illusion of an object, creature, or force, as visualized by you. The illusion does not create sound, smell, texture, or temperature. You can move the image within the limits of the size of the effect.
mythicText:
The duration increases to concentration + 1 round per caster level, and the effect increases to a visual figment that can’t extend beyond eight 10-foot cubes + 1 10-foot cube per caster level.

Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the duration changes to concentration + 1 minute per caster level and the effect changes to a visual figment no larger than a 50-foot emanation. An augmented mythic silent image can’t move.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 器材 (少许羊毛)
effect_zh: 视觉幻象，大小不能超过4个10尺边长的立方体+每等级1个十尺边长的立方体 (可变)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则不相信 (若有互动)
text_zh: 该法术会根据你的想像创造出一个物体、生物或力场的视觉幻象。幻象无法产生出声音、味道、表面触感或温度。你能够在效果限定的范围内移动幻象。
mythicText_zh:
法术的持续时间增加至‘专注 + 每施法者等级1轮’，而且效果变为‘视觉幻象，范围不超过8个边长10尺的立方体 + 每施法者等级1个边长10尺的立方体’。

强化（6阶）：若你花费2次神话之力，法术的持续时间就会变为‘专注 + 每施法者等级1分钟’，效果变为‘大小不超过50尺发散范围的视觉幻象’。强化版神话无声幻影不能移动。
